title: Love Island's Anna Vakili left so heartbroken by Jordan Hames she's scared of love
text:

Anna Vakili says she was left so heartbroken by Love Island beau Jordan Hames that she's too scared to get into another relationship.

The reality babe was devastated when boyfriend Jordan confessed his feelings for new girl India Reynolds just a day after asking her to make things official.

The 29-year-old admits she had a "hard" time in the villa, and says Jordan has made her more wary of the men she gets involved with on the outside world.

Anna, who is launching her new SIMMI London shoe collection with her sister Mandi tonight, told The Sun : "I date here and there, but I'm not looking for anything serious at the moment.

(Image: ITV)

"After the villa and what happened to me, I wanted to take a break from it. It wasn't the best experience in there. It was hard.

"When something like that happens to you, it always makes you extra careful. It's a lesson."

Anna said that what she went through with Jordan has made is harder for her to trust people, but that it's not a bad thing as it helps make her "more wary of the signs".

(Image: SIMMI SHOES)

(Image: ITV)

It comes after Anna said she hadn't invited Molly-Mae Hague to her launch party tonight.

She appeared to suggest that she hasn't stayed in touch with Molly as they didn't speak in the villa, however Anna did attend the launch party for Molly's PrettyLittleThing collection last month.

"People that didn't talk inside still don't," Anna told Mirror Online.

(Image: Phil Lewis/SOPA Images/REX)

But she hastily backtracked from naming any of her fellow Islanders, saying: "I mean, if I don’t speak to anyone it's mostly because we're just so busy with work."

And while Anna may not be ready to move on just yet, her ex Jordan has seemingly found romance with former TOWIE star Ferne McCann.

They were pictured kissing and gushed about how much they fancy each other as they attended the Mirror's Animal Hero Awards.
